resources.string:
Hey, My name is Kay. 

I am a motivated guy, and working hard to be an awesome Android developer. 

I started with kotlin on hobby base, and grown to really have a passion about this. 
I have several projects, and it has been a fun journey and a nice learning process. 

With my creativity skills and vision nothing is impossible with a simple app. 
My aim in Counter Strike is incredible, and my current rank is Legendary Eagle Master. 
They also say I am good Tetris player. 

With my asian DNA, I will probably cook much better rice then you. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to cook rice. 
A description of me in 3 words is "AWESOME" - "AWESOME" - "AWESOME".
